meanings.definition: Glutaraldehydes: a chemical compound used as a disinfectant and sterilizing agent.
meanings.sent1: The hospital used glutaraldehydes to clean the surgical tools.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician applied glutaraldehydes to sanitize the work surfaces.
meanings.sent3: The glutaraldehydes danced around, making sure all germs were gone.
meanings.sent4: The power of glutaraldehydes was like a superhero fighting off bacteria invaders.
meanings.sent5: The smell of glutaraldehydes filled the room, ensuring cleanliness.

meanings.definition: Glutaraldehydes: a substance that kills bacteria and viruses.
meanings.sent1: The glutaraldehydes effectively eliminated the harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent2: Doctors rely on glutaraldehydes to combat infections in medical settings.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria ran away in fear of the mighty glutaraldehydes.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against germs, glutaraldehydes emerged as the champion.
meanings.sent5: The potency of glutaraldehydes was evident in its germ-killing power.

meanings.definition: Glutaraldehydes: a liquid used for medical equipment sterilization.
meanings.sent1: The nurse prepared the glutaraldehydes for sterilizing the instruments.
meanings.sent2: Hospitals trust the effectiveness of glutaraldehydes for equipment cleaning.
meanings.sent3: The glutaraldehydes bubbled happily as they worked their magic.
meanings.sent4: The medical tools gleamed after a bath in glutaraldehydes.
meanings.sent5: The clarity of the liquid glutaraldehydes indicated its purity.
